message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 split seems fair considering the inflation working against you.
Considering the inflation, I think 55/45 is a more reasonable split. It's my turn to make an offer, and I'm hoping we can settle on this.
Bob, time is literally money in this game, and it's disappearing faster for you. I'll come down slightly to 58/42. Take it before it shrinks further!
I understand we're both losing value, but I believe 52/48 is a more balanced split considering the inflation difference. Let's settle before it's too late!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm dropping my offer to 55/45. You're losing serious money with every refusal.  Take the deal now!
